p: CHIKV infection of the fat bodies of the Aedes species, described for other arboviruses (e.g., dengue virus 2 (DENV 2) and Zika virus (ZIKV)) [ 49, 55], is currently undetermined. On the contrary, viral isolation from the legs and wings indicate the presence of CHIKV in these districts [ 56] (see Figure 1 for CHIKV mosquito tissue tropism).
